verses.verse: וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> will come בְּאַחֲרִ֣ית <S%H319><s%> But in the last הַיָּמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> days יִ֠הְיֶה <S%H1961><s%> will come הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> it shall come to pass [that] the mountain בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD נָכוֹן֙ <S%H3559><s%> shall be established בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> in the top הֶהָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains וְנִשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> and it shall be exalted ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מִגְּבָע֑וֹת <S%H1389><s%> above the hills וְנָהֲר֥וּ <S%H5102><s%> shall flow עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> and עַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> and people

וְֽהָלְכ֞וּ <S%H1980><s%> shall come גּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> nations רַבִּ֗ים <S%H7227><s%> And many וְאָֽמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> and say לְכ֣וּ ׀ <S%H1980><s%> Come וְנַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> and let us go up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> to the mountain יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to בֵּית֙ <S%H1004><s%> and to the house אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> of the God יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob וְיוֹרֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H3384><s%> and he will teach מִדְּרָכָ֔יו <S%H1870><s%> us of his ways וְנֵלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> may walk בְּאֹֽרְחֹתָ֑יו <S%H734><s%> in his paths כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> from מִצִּיּוֹן֙ <S%H6726><s%> of Zion תֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> shall go forth תוֹרָ֔ה <S%H8451><s%> for the law וּדְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> and the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God מִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> from Jerusalem

וְשָׁפַ֗ט <S%H8199><s%> And he shall judge בֵּ֚ין <S%H996><s%> between עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> people רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> among many וְהוֹכִ֛יחַ <S%H3198><s%> and rebuke לְגוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> nations עֲצֻמִ֖ים <S%H6099><s%> strong עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against רָח֑וֹק <S%H7350><s%> afar off וְכִתְּת֨וּ <S%H3807><s%> and they shall beat חַרְבֹתֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H2719><s%> their swords לְאִתִּ֗ים <S%H855><s%> into plowshares וַחֲנִיתֹֽתֵיהֶם֙ <S%H2595><s%> and their spears לְמַזְמֵר֔וֹת <S%H4211><s%> into pruninghooks לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and never יִשְׂא֞וּ <S%H5375><s%> shall not lift up גּ֤וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against גּוֹי֙ <S%H1471><s%> against nation חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> a sword וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and never יִלְמְד֥וּן <S%H3925><s%> neither shall they learn ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> war

וְיָשְׁב֗וּ <S%H3427><s%> But they shall sit אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man תַּ֧חַת <S%H8478><s%> under גַּפְנ֛וֹ <S%H1612><s%> under his vine וְתַ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> and under תְּאֵנָת֖וֹ <S%H8384><s%> and under his fig tree וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> no מַחֲרִ֑יד <S%H2729><s%> and none shall make [them] afraid כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For פִ֛י <S%H6310><s%> for the mouth יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts דִּבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> Though כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> For all people יֵלְכ֕וּ <S%H1980><s%> walk אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> in the name אֱלֹהָ֑יו <S%H430><s%> of his god וַאֲנַ֗חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we נֵלֵ֛ךְ <S%H1980><s%> will walk בְּשֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> in the name יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> and ever פ

בַּיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֹֽסְפָה֙ <S%H622><s%> will I assemble הַצֹּ֣לֵעָ֔ה <S%H6760><s%> her that halteth וְהַנִּדָּחָ֖ה <S%H5080><s%> her that is driven out אֲקַבֵּ֑צָה <S%H6908><s%> and I will gather וַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> whom הֲרֵעֹֽתִי׃ <S%H7489><s%> and her that I have afflicted

וְשַׂמְתִּ֤י <S%H7760><s%> And I will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצֹּֽלֵעָה֙ <S%H6760><s%> her that halted לִשְׁאֵרִ֔ית <S%H7611><s%> a remnant וְהַנַּהֲלָאָ֖ה <S%H1972><s%> and her that was cast far off לְג֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation עָצ֑וּם <S%H6099><s%> a strong וּמָלַ֨ךְ <S%H4427><s%> shall reign יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> over בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> over them in mount צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion מֵעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> now וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> from henceforth even for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever פ

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you מִגְדַּל־ <S%H4026><s%> And thou O tower עֵ֗דֶר <S%H5739><s%> of the flock עֹ֛פֶל <S%H6076><s%> the strong hold בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> of the daughter צִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion עָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H5704><s%> against תֵּאתֶ֑ה <S%H857><s%> unto thee shall it come וּבָאָ֗ה <S%H935><s%> shall come הַמֶּמְשָׁלָה֙ <S%H4475><s%> dominion הָרִ֣אשֹׁנָ֔ה <S%H7223><s%> even the first מַמְלֶ֖כֶת <S%H4467><s%> the kingdom לְבַ֥ת־ <S%H1323><s%> to the daughter יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem

עַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> Now לָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> why תָרִ֖יעִי <S%H7321><s%> Now why dost thou cry רֵ֑עַ <S%H7452><s%> aloud הֲמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> no בָּ֗ךְ אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> Or יוֹעֲצֵךְ֙ <S%H3289><s%> in thee? is thy counsellor אָבָ֔ד <S%H6><s%> perished כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הֶחֱזִיקֵ֥ךְ <S%H2388><s%> have taken חִ֖יל <S%H2427><s%> ? for pangs כַּיּוֹלֵדָֽה׃ <S%H3205><s%> thee as a woman in travail

ח֧וּלִי <S%H2342><s%> Be in pain וָגֹ֛חִי <S%H1518><s%> and labour to bring forth בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> O daughter צִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion כַּיּֽוֹלֵדָ֑ה <S%H3205><s%> like a woman in travail כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For עַתָּה֩ <S%H6258><s%> now תֵצְאִ֨י <S%H3318><s%> for now shalt thou go forth מִקִּרְיָ֜ה <S%H7151><s%> out of the city וְשָׁכַ֣נְתְּ <S%H7931><s%> and thou shalt dwell בַּשָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field וּבָ֤את <S%H935><s%> and thou shalt go עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בָּבֶל֙ <S%H894><s%> [even] to Babylon שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> There תִּנָּצֵ֔לִי <S%H5337><s%> there shalt thou be delivered שָׁ֚ם <S%H8033><s%> There יִגְאָלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1350><s%> shall redeem יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> there the LORD מִכַּ֖ף <S%H3709><s%> thee from the hand אֹיְבָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H341><s%> of thine enemies

וְעַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> and now נֶאֶסְפ֥וּ <S%H622><s%> are gathered עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> against גּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> nations רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> Now also many הָאֹמְרִ֣ים <S%H559><s%> against thee that say תֶּחֱנָ֔ף <S%H2610><s%> Let her be defiled וְתַ֥חַז <S%H2372><s%> look בְּצִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> upon Zion עֵינֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5869><s%> and let our eye

וְהֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יָֽדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> But they know מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת <S%H4284><s%> not the thoughts יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not הֵבִ֖ינוּ <S%H995><s%> neither understand עֲצָת֑וֹ <S%H6098><s%> they his counsel כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for קִבְּצָ֖ם <S%H6908><s%> for he shall gather כֶּעָמִ֥יר <S%H5995><s%> them as the sheaves גֹּֽרְנָה׃ <S%H1637><s%> into the floor

ק֧וּמִי <S%H6965><s%> Arise וָד֣וֹשִׁי <S%H1758><s%> and thresh בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> O daughter צִיּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For קַרְנֵ֞ךְ <S%H7161><s%> thine horn אָשִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> for I will make בַּרְזֶל֙ <S%H1270><s%> iron וּפַרְסֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H6541><s%> thy hoofs אָשִׂ֣ים <S%H7760><s%> and I will make נְחוּשָׁ֔ה <S%H5154><s%> brass וַהֲדִקּ֖וֹת <S%H1854><s%> and thou shalt beat in pieces עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> people רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> many וְהַחֲרַמְתִּ֤י <S%H2763><s%> and I will consecrate לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD בִּצְעָ֔ם <S%H1214><s%> covet וְחֵילָ֖ם <S%H2428><s%> and their substance לַאֲד֥וֹן <S%H113><s%> unto the Lord כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the whole earth
